description: The problem is a NameError that occurs when trying to access an attribute of a NamedTuple object that does not exist. This NameError occurs when the code is trying to access an attribute of the NamedTuple that has not been defined.
code:
from collections import namedtuple

MyTuple = namedtuple('MyTuple', ['name', 'age'])

t = MyTuple('John', 30)

print(t.height)
